name: WWE 2K19 - WOOOOO! Edition Pack
detailed_description: Walk that aisle in style and profile with the WWE 2K19 Wooooo! Edition Pack!  Featuring downloadable arenas, attires and Superstars such as Dusty Rhodes, Rowdy Roddy Piper, Randy Savage, and more!
about_the_game: Walk that aisle in style and profile with the WWE 2K19 Wooooo! Edition Pack!  Featuring downloadable arenas, attires and Superstars such as Dusty Rhodes, Rowdy Roddy Piper, Randy Savage, and more!
short_description: Walk that aisle in style and profile with the WWE 2K19 Wooooo! Edition Pack! Featuring downloadable arenas, attires and Superstars such as Dusty Rhodes, Rowdy Roddy Piper, Randy Savage, and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: 64-bit: Windows® 7 (latest updates)
  • Prozessor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM
  • Grafik: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Speicherplatz: 50 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Soundkarte: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: At least 2 GB DDR Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Empfohlen:
  • Betriebssystem: 64-bit: Windows® 7, Windows® 8 (8.1) or Windows® 10 (latest updates)
  • Prozessor: Intel Core i7 3770 / AMD FX-8350
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 8 GB RAM
  • Grafik: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Speicherplatz: 50 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Soundkarte: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
